channel.title: Help, looking for a stable pve private server
channel.description: im looking for a server i can run on my laptop that is stable and has the least amount of glitches. i dont have internet allot of the time so i want to find a good server emulator or private server i can run and play runescape by myself, i have exp with running my own wow server so im sure i can handle setting it up. please only reply with servers that are good for pve and not pvp, thanks.

item.title: Help, looking for a stable pve private server
item.dc:creator: @jinxer089 jinxer089
item.description:
@jinxer089 wrote:

cool, and sorry for posting in the wrong place guys. do any of you know of a specific one i should download, most wow private servers are all pve and you only need to run a few files to have it up and running. i live out in the sticks in ohio and to have internet it would cost us 250 a month (to run new cables is what time warner told us) so private servers are a blessing. i can follow tutorials just fine and all i just need to find the most stable pve server, i looked at the list for an hour and i cant find one thats for pve, i dont really understand all the jargen either.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, looking for a stable pve private server

item.title: Help, looking for a stable pve private server
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

ravekitty:

Might be easier to use a source that doesnt have too much stuff added to it, also things under process() in client.java can cause more lag, so make them an event instead and asupposedly 508 are the most unstable o_O

508’s are almost as unstable as Iraq…

Read full topic
item.source: Help, looking for a stable pve private server
